comprehensive_overview: dos2unix is a command-line utility that converts text files with DOS or Windows line endings (CRLF) to Unix line endings (LF) format.
core_features:
1. Converts text files from DOS/Windows line endings (CRLF) to Unix line endings (LF).
2. Preserves the file ownership, permissions, and timestamps.
3. Can handle conversion of multiple files in batch mode.
